name: Treasure Hunt (MohammedZaid)
description:
Treasure Hunt! Play by using WASD and Space to jump.  You can move the camera by moving your mouse left and right. Camera does not affect movement. Collect the 4 red cubes to win and escape the Island!

Bugs: Cubes do not detect main character sometimes and NPC follows but can not kill main character.

Song: 

Skyrim - Dragonborn (Piano Version)
